definitions: (of two or more objects or events) not existing or happening at the same time.
of or requiring a form of computer control timing protocol in which a specific operation begins upon receipt of an indication (signal) that the preceding operation has been completed.
(of a machine or motor) not working in time with the alternations of current.
shortDefinitions: not working in time with alternations of current

definitions: (of a satellite) revolving around the parent planet at a different rate from that at which the planet rotates.
shortDefinitions: revolving round planet at different rate

definitions: (of an orbit) such that a satellite in it is asynchronous.
shortDefinitions: (of orbit) such that satellite in it is asynchronous
